title: New Updaaate!!!!
body:
i was updating my new lol,but the update restart when i get out from the app!!!
update size: 142.00mb
please someone help meeeeeeeeeeee i only have 3G and it will finish soon!!
i wait until the update finish and i play some games with ww XDDD, but when i finish i get out from lol the app.
when i go to enter again !! the update restaaaaaaart;((((({{champion:19}}

replies.body: It sounds like your current network strength might be failing to grab the updates properly and backtracking.  If possible at all, swap to a wired connection or non-cellular to strengthen things up a bit.  Using a mobile data like this can cause instability not just from updates but issues in-game as well.  :/
